solution_line_template: Today, {num_bottles} bottles of ${cost_per_bottle_today} wine will cost {num_bottles}*{cost_per_bottle_today} = $<<{num_bottles}*{cost_per_bottle_today}={total_cost_today}>>{total_cost_today}

In 2 months there will be a {tariff_increase_percent_num}% tariff on the {num_bottles} bottles of wine that cost ${total_cost_today} so that makes the {num_bottles} bottles {tariff_increase_percent_decimal}*{total_cost_today} = ${increase_cost} more expensive
